title: Up to 40% off our new infographic book – next 48 hours

description: Special offer available for Amazon Prime members on Amazon today and tomorrow (12 & 13th July 2022) Get yourself 200+ hand-crafted infographics and visualisations, surfacing positive trends, uplifting stats and creative solutions to the world’s problems. » Order Beautiful News from Amazon today » See inside n.b. % discount depends on your country (I believe)
content:encoded:
Special offer available for Amazon Prime members on Amazon today and tomorrow (12 & 13th July 2022)
